#summary Sites that are searched

= Introduction =
Visualize History is not in the business of indexing and storing the world's historical information.  Rather, it uses the many existing sites and their public interfaces to find historical data.

= Potential Sites =
These are sites that I've noticed but haven't checked out yet

 * [http://www.sp.uconn.edu/~djleu/fourth.html Teaching with the Internet]
 * Google News Archive timelines
  * [http://googlesystem.blogspot.com/2007/12/google-news-archives-updated-timelines.html Blog posting]
  * [http://www.google.com/views?q=bach+view%3Atimeline example: Bach]
 * [http://gos2.geodata.gov/wps/portal/gos Geospatial One Stop]
 * Census Data
